WASHINGTON, Feb. 7( UPI)-- President Bush U.S. Defense Donald Rumsfeld Donald Rumsfeld is conceding" it's possible" too few troops were sent to invade Iraq. In a war, many things cost lives, Donald Rumsfeld told ABC in an interview to be broadcast on" Nightline" Monday. President Bush has written that the troop level in Iraq was" the most important failure in the execution of the war."

Decision on Nitro-Liberty replacement Chrysler is near a decision on the replacement for the lightly regarded Dodge Nitro and Jeep Liberty SUVs, built at the company's Toledo North Assembly plant, Sergio Marchionne said. It's the most significant hole in our product portfolio, said Sergio Marchionne , referring to the mid-sized SUV segment. The Nitro and Liberty, which trail segment leaders such as the Honda CRV and Ford Escape, were among the few vehicles that were not revamped in the 2011

Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business." We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. It's a place to socialize. It's a place to watch TV. We have Hulu coming. It's the only system where you are the controller.
